verses.verse: In the first <WH259> year <WH8141> of Darius <WH1867> the son <WH1121> of Ahasuerus <WH325>, of the seed <WH2233> of the Medes <WH4074>, which was made king <WH4427> over the realm <WH4438> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>;

In the first <WH259> year <WH8141> of his reign <WH4427> I Daniel <WH1840> understood <WH995> by books <WH5612> the number <WH4557> of the years <WH8141>, whereof the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came to Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030>, that he would accomplish <WH4390> seventy <WH7657> years <WH8141> in the desolations <WH2723> of Jerusalem <WH3389>.

And I set <WH5414> my face <WH6440> unto the Lord <WH136> God <WH430>, to seek <WH1245> by prayer <WH8605> and supplications <WH8469>, with fasting <WH6685>, and sackcloth <WH8242>, and ashes <WH665>:

And I prayed <WH6419> unto the Lord <WH3068> my God <WH430>, and made my confession <WH3034>, and said <WH559>, O <WH577> Lord <WH136>, the great <WH1419> and dreadful <WH3372> God <WH410>, keeping <WH8104> the covenant <WH1285> and mercy <WH2617> to them that love <WH157> him <WH8104>, and to them that keep his commandments <WH4687>;

We have sinned <WH2398>, and have committed iniquity <WH5753>, and have done wickedly <WH7561>, and have rebelled <WH4775>, even by departing <WH5493> from your precepts <WH4687> and from your judgments <WH4941>:

Neither have we listened <WH8085> unto your servants <WH5650> the prophets <WH5030>, which spoke <WH1696> in your name <WH8034> to our kings <WH4428>, our princes <WH8269>, and our fathers <WH1>, and to all the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776>.

O Lord <WH136>, righteousness <WH6666> belongs unto you <WH1322>, but unto us confusion of faces <WH6440>, as at this day <WH3117>; to the men <WH376> of Judah <WH3063>, and to the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, and unto all Israel <WH3478>, that are near <WH7138>, and that are far off <WH7350>, through all the countries <WH776> where you have driven <WH5080> them <WH4604>, because of their trespass that they have trespassed against you <WH4603>.
O Lord <WH136>, to us belongs confusion <WH1322> of face <WH6440>, to our kings <WH4428>, to our princes <WH8269>, and to our fathers <WH1>, because we have sinned against you <WH2398>.
To the Lord <WH136> our God <WH430> belong mercies <WH7356> and forgivenesses <WH5547>, though we have rebelled against him <WH4775>;

Neither have we obeyed <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430>, to walk <WH3212> in his laws <WH8451>, which he set <WH5414> before <WH6440> us by <WH3027> his servants <WH5650> the prophets <WH5030>.

Yes <WH3478>, all Israel have transgressed <WH5674> your law <WH8451>, even by departing <WH5493>, that they might not obey <WH8085> your voice <WH6963>; therefore the curse <WH423> is poured <WH5413> upon us <WH7621>, and the oath that is written <WH3789> in the law <WH8451> of Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of God <WH430>, because we have sinned against him <WH2398>.

And he has confirmed <WH6965> his words <WH1697>, which he spoke <WH1696> against us <WH8199>, and against our judges that judged <WH8199> us <WH935>, by bringing upon us a great <WH1419> evil <WH7451>: for under the whole heaven <WH8064> has not been done <WH6213> as has been done <WH6213> upon Jerusalem <WH3389>.

As it is written <WH3789> in the law <WH8451> of Moses <WH4872>, all this evil <WH7451> is come <WH935> upon us <WH2470>: yet made we not our prayer before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430>, that we might turn <WH7725> from our iniquities <WH5771>, and understand <WH7919> your truth <WH571>.

Therefore has the Lord <WH3068> watched <WH8245> upon the evil <WH7451>, and brought <WH935> it upon us <WH3068>: for the Lord our God <WH430> is righteous <WH6662> in all his works <WH4639> which he does <WH6213>: for we obeyed <WH8085> not his voice <WH6963>.

And now <WH136>, O Lord our God <WH430>, that have brought <WH3318> your people <WH5971> forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027>, and have gotten <WH6213> you renown <WH8034>, as at this day <WH3117>; we have sinned <WH2398>, we have done wickedly <WH7561>.

O Lord <WH136>, according to all your righteousness <WH6666>, I beg you <WH639>, let your anger and your fury <WH2534> be turned away <WH7725> from your city <WH5892> Jerusalem <WH3389>, your holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022>: because for our sins <WH2399>, and for the iniquities <WH5771> of our fathers <WH1>, Jerusalem <WH3389> and your people <WH5971> are become a reproach <WH2781> to all that are about us <WH5439>.

Now therefore <WH430>, O our God, hear <WH8085> the prayer <WH8605> of your servant <WH5650>, and his supplications <WH8469>, and cause your face <WH6440> to shine <WH215> upon your sanctuary <WH4720> that is desolate <WH8076>, for the Lord <WH136>'s sake.

O my God <WH430>, incline <WH5186> your ear <WH241>, and hear <WH8085>; open <WH6491> your eyes <WH5869>, and behold <WH7200> our desolations <WH8074>, and the city <WH5892> which is called <WH7121> by your name <WH8034>: for we do not present <WH5307> our supplications <WH8469> before <WH6440> you for our righteousnesses <WH6666>, but for your great <WH7227> mercies <WH7356>.

O Lord <WH136>, hear <WH8085>; O Lord <WH136>, forgive <WH5545>; O Lord <WH136>, listen <WH7181> and do <WH6213>; defer <WH309> not <WH408>, for your own sake <WH430>, O my God: for your city <WH5892> and your people <WH5971> are called <WH7121> by your name <WH8034>.

And while I was speaking <WH1696>, and praying <WH6419>, and confessing <WH3034> my sin <WH2403> and the sin <WH2403> of my people <WH5971> Israel <WH3478>, and presenting <WH5307> my supplication <WH8467> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> my God <WH430> for the holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022> of my God <WH430>;

Yes <WH1696>, while I was speaking in prayer <WH8605>, even the man <WH376> Gabriel <WH1403>, whom I had seen <WH7200> in the vision <WH2377> at the beginning <WH8462>, being caused to fly <WH3286> swiftly <WH3288>, touched <WH5060> me about the time <WH6256> of the evening <WH6153> oblation <WH4503>.
And he informed <WH995> me <WH1696>, and talked with me <WH559>, and said, O Daniel <WH1840>, I am now come forth <WH3318> to give you skill <WH7919> and understanding <WH998>.

At the beginning <WH8462> of your supplications <WH8469> the commandment <WH1697> came forth <WH3318>, and I am come <WH935> to show <WH5046> you <WH2532>; for you are greatly beloved: therefore understand <WH995> the matter <WH1697>, and consider <WH995> the vision <WH4758>.

Seventy <WH7657> weeks <WH7620> are determined <WH2852> upon your people <WH5971> and upon your holy <WH6944> city <WH5892>, to finish <WH3607> the transgression <WH6588>, and to make a end <WH8552> of sins <WH2403>, and to make reconciliation <WH3722> for iniquity <WH5771>, and to bring in <WH935> everlasting <WH5769> righteousness <WH6664>, and to seal up <WH2856> the vision <WH2377> and prophecy <WH5030>, and to anoint <WH4886> the most <WH6944> Holy <WH6944>.

Know <WH3045> therefore and understand <WH7919>, that from the going forth <WH4161> of the commandment <WH1697> to restore <WH7725> and to build <WH1129> Jerusalem <WH3389> unto the Messiah <WH4899> the Prince <WH5057> shall be seven <WH7651> weeks <WH7620>, and sixty <WH8346> and two <WH8147> weeks <WH7620>: the street <WH7339> shall be built <WH1129> again <WH7725>, and the wall <WH2742>, even in troubled <WH6695> times <WH6256>.

And after <WH310> sixty <WH8346> and two <WH8147> weeks <WH7620> shall Messiah <WH4899> be cut off <WH3772>, but not for himself <WH5971>: and the people of the prince <WH5057> that shall come <WH935> shall destroy <WH7843> the city <WH5892> and the sanctuary <WH6944>; and the end <WH7093> there shall be with a flood <WH7858>, and unto the end <WH7093> of the war <WH4421> desolations <WH8074> are determined <WH2782>.

And he shall confirm <WH1396> the covenant <WH1285> with many <WH7227> for one <WH259> week <WH7620>: and in the midst <WH2677> of the week <WH7620> he shall cause the sacrifice <WH2077> and the oblation <WH4503> to cease <WH7673>, and for the overspreading <WH3671> of abominations <WH8251> he shall make it desolate <WH8074>, even until the consummation <WH3617>, and that determined <WH2782> shall be poured <WH5413> upon the desolate <WH8074>.
